title: The Terrible Secret of Sea Monkeys (Live Show)
itunes:title: The Terrible Secret of Sea Monkeys (Live Show)
description:
In Episode 98, Robert is joined live in Portland by Billy Wayne Davis for an episode about sea monkeys.


FOOTNOTES:

  1. The Shocking True Tale Of The Mad Genius Who Invented Sea-Monkeys
  2. A Petri Dish For Racism Supremacists’ Message Spreading Through Nation, Butler Says
  3. The Sea Monkeys and the White Supremacist
  4. CONTRASTS OF A PRIVATE PERSONA
  5. From brine to online: Sea-Monkeys for your PC
  6. HITLER AND THE SEA-MONKEYS
  7. Monkey Business To their adoring legions of fans, Sea-Monkeys are the ultimate in Kitsch.
  8. The Battle Over the Sea-Monkey Fortune
  9. The Bizarre Story of Anti-Jewish Jew Harold von Braunhut

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
